name: [Web Demo] Color Royale - Alpha 1.0.4
description:
Game in development ...

Yeah i know ...  A lot of bugs but still fun haha !

  • Color Royale is a mix of battle royale and platform game,
  • In this game your main objective is to be the only color in the round or to be the last player alive!
  • Call your friends to play this funny and competitive game.
  • 2-4 Players but you can play with 3 players because the game is a FFA (Free for All)
  • Support only keyboard (for now)

If you have any suggestion or critic please comment below!
